熱望: (ねつぼう) - longing for; burning desire
熱核反応: (ねつかくはんのう) - thermonuclear reaction
熱水: (ねっすい) - hot water or liquid (especially that below the surface of the earth)
熱水湧出域: (ねっすいゆうしゅついき) - hydrothermal discharge zone
熱熱: (あつあつ) - piping hot; passionately in love
熱狂ぶり: (ねっきょうぶり) - craze; frenzy; enthusiasm
熱狂振り: (ねっきょうぶり) - craze; frenzy; enthusiasm
熱狂的: (ねっきょうてき) - wildly enthusiastic; crazy (about something)
熱狂的信者: (ねっきょうてきしんじゃ) - fanatic
熱疲労: (ねつひろう) - thermal fatigue (e.g. in structures); heat exhaustion
熱的低気圧: (ねつてきていきあつ) - thermal low; heat low
熱的死: (ねつてきし) - heat death (i.e. of the universe)
熱盛: (あつもり) - warm soba noodles (esp. for dipping, either served after being boiled, or cooled and then rewarmed)
熱盛り: (あつもり) - warm soba noodles (esp. for dipping, either served after being boiled, or cooled and then rewarmed)
熱盛りそば: (あつもりそば) - warm soba noodles (esp. for dipping, either served after being boiled, or cooled and then rewarmed)
熱盛り蕎麦: (あつもりそば) - warm soba noodles (esp. for dipping, either served after being boiled, or cooled and then rewarmed)
熱盛蕎麦: (あつもりそば) - warm soba noodles (esp. for dipping, either served after being boiled, or cooled and then rewarmed)
熱硬化剤: (ねつこうかざい) - hardener (catalyst in hardening thermosetting materials)
熱硬化物: (ねつこうかぶつ) - thermosetting material (esp. plastics and resins)
熱線: (ねっせん) - heat ray; line of heat
熱膨張係数: (ねつぼうちょうけいすう) - thermal expansion coefficient
熱臭い: (ねつくさい) - warm (esp. from the fever of a sick person); hot; stuffy
熱血: (ねっけつ) - hot blood; zeal; fervor; fervour; ardor
熱血教師: (ねっけつきょうし) - (yoji) enthusiastic schoolteacher
熱設計電力: (ねつせっけいでんりょく) - thermal design power
熱転写プリンタ: (ねつてんしゃプリンタ) - thermal wax transfer printer
熱量: (ねつりょう) - calorific value; quantity of heat; calorie
熾きる: (おきる) - to be kindled (fire); to be made
熾す: (おこす) - to build (a fire); to make; to start; to light
熾火: (おきび) - glowing ember (either red hot charcoal or the glowing remains of burnt firewood); live charcoal
燃えがら: (もえがら) - embers; cinders; burnt residue; combustion residue
燃えさかる: (もえさかる) - to blaze; to burn brightly
燃えつく: (もえつく) - to catch fire; to ignite
燃える: (もえる) - to burn; to get fired up
燃え上がる: (もえあがる) - to flare up; to burst into flames
燃え付く: (もえつく) - to catch fire; to ignite
燃え尽き症候群: (もえつきしょうこうぐん) - burnout syndrome
燃え差し: (もえさし) - embers; stub (of a used candle)
燃え殻: (もえがら) - embers; cinders; burnt residue; combustion residue
燃え盛る: (もえさかる) - to blaze; to burn brightly
燃え移る: (もえうつる) - (of fire) to spread; to extend itself
燃え立つ: (もえたつ) - to blaze up; to burn up
燃付く: (もえつく) - to catch fire; to ignite
燃料プール: (ねんりょうプール) - (spent) fuel pool; SFP; storage pool for spent nuclear fuel
燃料ペレット: (ねんりょうペレット) - fuel pellet (e.g. nuclear)
燃料不足: (ねんりょうぶそく) - fuel shortage
燃料切れ: (ねんりょうぎれ) - out of fuel
